mapper.select: SELECT v.VAC_ID,e.EMP_NAME,e.EMP_DEPT,e.EMP_GRADE,v.VAC_TYPE,v.VAC_START_DATE,v.VAC_END_DATE,v.VAC_REG_DATE FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE e JOIN TBL_VACATION v ON e.EMP_ID=v.EMP_ID WHERE vac_status='승인대기';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_VACATION(VAC_TYPE, EMP_ID, VAC_START_DATE,VAC_END_DATE,ADM_ID, VAC_RESN, VAC_STATUS) VALUES(#{vacType}, #{empId}, #{vacStartDate}, #{vacEndDate}, #{admId},#{vacResn}, #{vacStatus})

INSERT INTO TBL_VACATION(VAC_TYPE, EMP_ID, VAC_START_DATE,VAC_END_DATE,FILE_ID,ADM_ID, VAC_RESN, VAC_STATUS,FILE_NAME) VALUES(#{vacType}, #{empId}, #{vacStartDate}, #{vacEndDate}, #{fileId},#{admId},#{vacResn}, #{vacStatus},#{fileName})
mapper.select: SELECT v.VAC_ID, e.EMP_NAME,e.EMP_DEPT,e.EMP_GRADE,v.VAC_TYPE,v.VAC_START_DATE,v.VAC_END_DATE,v.VAC_REG_DATE, v.VAC_STATUS FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE e JOIN TBL_VACATION v ON e.EMP_ID=v.EMP_ID WHERE MONTH(v.VAC_START_DATE)=#{today.monthValue} AND DAY(v.VAC_START_DATE) >=DAY(CURRENT_DATE()) AND EMP_DEPT=#{empDept} AND VAC_STATUS='승인완료' ORDER BY v.VAC_START_DATE ASC;

SELECT v.VAC_ID, e.EMP_NAME,e.EMP_DEPT,e.EMP_GRADE,v.VAC_TYPE,v.VAC_START_DATE,v.VAC_END_DATE,v.VAC_REG_DATE, v.VAC_STATUS FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE e JOIN TBL_VACATION v ON e.EMP_ID=v.EMP_ID WHERE MONTH(v.VAC_START_DATE)=#{today.monthValue} AND e.EMP_DEPT=#{empDept} AND v.VAC_STATUS='승인완료';

SELECT e.EMP_NAME, e.EMP_DEPT, e.EMP_GRADE, v.VAC_TYPE, v.VAC_START_DATE, v.VAC_END_DATE FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE e JOIN TBL_VACATION v ON e.EMP_ID = v.EMP_ID WHERE v.VAC_START_DATE= (CURRENT_DATE) AND EMP_DEPT = #{empDept} AND VAC_STATUS = '승인완료' ORDER BY v.VAC_START_DATE ASC;
